contest-event.event-date:
April 10, 1950 D Queensland State Brass Band Championship (A Grade)
Queensland State Brass Band Championship (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Queensland State Brass Band Championship queensland-state-brass-band-championship-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest
No.1 Beethoven's Works / No.2 Scheharazade (Part 3 & 4)
Bundaberg Show Ground , Bundaberg Queensland During the Brisbane Waterside Workers Band performing their 2nd Test selection (Scheharazade ) a heavy rain storm hit the area causing the canvas roofing of the stage to collapsed . The band immediately ceased playing and seek refuge . At a latter time the band refused the offer to return to the stage and either continue from the point they ceased or commence again . Saturated ,they declined both offers and withdrew from the contest. 2nd Test selection points listed under Own Choice Marching Events ' Street / Oval / Diagram marching points listed under STAGE MARCH
Sept. 24, 2018, 12:30 a.m. March 24, 2019, 12:08 a.m.
1 Maryborough Brass [Queensland] James Kelly
2 South Brisbane Federal Band Les Baxter
3 Toowoomba R S L Municipal (Qld) Norm Hestridge
4 Rockhampton City Brass Band Bill Smith
5 Brisbane City Waterside Workers Harry Perkins
